author: Staff Reporter
text:
The BJP State president, Tamilisai Soundararajan, and Congress leader E.V.K.S. Elangovan, on Thursday visited the activists who were observing a fast at Avinashi for speedy implementation of Athikadavu-Avinashi Flood Flow Canal Scheme. Both the leaders extended their support to the demand.

The fast entered the fourth day on Thursday.

Promises

According to the activists of the Struggle Committee, the successive governments in the State did not stick to the pre-poll promises made over the last many decades. “If the scheme gets commissioned, it will recharge the depleting groundwater resources in Avinashi, Perumanallur and its hinterland and improve the drinking water potential,” they said.
title: Fast: BJP, Congress extend support
